headline: Arthur J. Gallagher Strikes $13.45 Billion Deal to Buy AssuredPartners
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) agreed to acquire insurance brokerage AssuredPartners in an all-cash deal

headline: Arthur J. Gallagher to Acquire AssuredPartners for $13.45 Billion
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher said that buying the insurance broker would expand its retail middle-market property and casualty focus across the U.S.

raw.headline: Arthur J. Gallagher to Acquire AssuredPartners for $13.45 Billion

headline: GTCR Announces Sale of AssuredPartners to Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. for $13.45 Billion
summary: GTCR, a leading private equity firm, announced today that it has signed a definitive agreement to sell AssuredPartners ("Assured" or the "Company"), a leading independent insurance broker, to Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE: AJG) ("Gallagher"), a global insurance brokerage, risk management and consulting services firm for $13.45 billion in an all-cash transaction. This transaction is the largest sale of a U.S. insurance broker to a strategic acquiror in the history of the industry.

raw.headline: GTCR Announces Sale of AssuredPartners to Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. for $13.45 Billion
raw.summary: GTCR, a leading private equity firm, announced today that it has signed a definitive agreement to sell AssuredPartners ("Assured" or the "Company"), a leading independent insurance broker, to Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE: AJG) ("Gallagher"), a global insurance brokerage, risk management and consulting services firm for $13.45 billion in an all-cash transaction. This transaction is the largest sale of a U.S. insurance broker to a strategic acquiror in the history of the industry.

headline: Apax Funds to Sell Minority Stake in AssuredPartners to Arthur J. Gallagher & Co.
summary: Funds advised by Apax Partners LLP ("Apax"), a leading global private equity advisory firm, today announced that they have entered into a definitive agreement to sell their minority stake in AssuredPartners ("the Company"), a premier global insurance brokerage firm, to Arthur J. Gallagher & Co., a global insurance brokerage, risk management and consulting services firm, as part of a $13.45 billion all-cash transaction.

Gallagher & Co., a global insurance brokerage, risk management and consulting services firm, as part of a $13.45 billion all-cash transaction.

headline: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. Announces $8.5 Billion Common Stock Offering
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE: AJG) ("Gallagher") today announced an underwritten public offering of $8.5 billion of its common stock. Morgan Stanley & Co. LLC is acting as lead active book-running manager and BofA Securities, Inc. is acting as active book-running manager for the offering. Gallagher also intends to grant the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase an additional $1.275 billion of shares of common stock from Gallagher.

raw.headline: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. Announces $8.5 Billion Common Stock Offering
raw.summary: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE: AJG) ("Gallagher") today announced an underwritten public offering of $8.5 billion of its common stock. Morgan Stanley & Co. LLC is acting as lead active book-running manager and BofA Securities, Inc. is acting as active book-running manager for the offering. Gallagher also intends to grant the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase an additional $1.275 billion of shares of common stock from Gallagher.

headline: Arthur J Gallagher strikes $13.5 billion deal to strengthen US insurance broker business
summary: Gallagher follows in the footsteps of rivals Aon and Marsh McLennan, which have also struck $13 billion and $7.75 billion, deals, respectively, over the last 12 months to expand into the vast and fast-growing middle-market insurance business.  Middle-market insurance caters to mid-sized businesses that generate annual revenue between $10 million and $1 billion.  The Insurer, a Reuters publication, exclusively reported on Sunday that Gallagher was close to sealing the deal for AssuredPartners.

headline: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. Signs Agreement to Acquire AssuredPartners
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. today announced it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire AssuredPartners. The transaction is subject to customary regulatory approvals and is expected to close during the first quarter of 2025.
